document_data.name: ''Wand of Tinkering''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wands of tinkering''''' were simple metal [[wand]]s that could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The ''wand of tinkering'' was a suitable [[spell focus]] for craftsfolk and those working with clockwork components who used [[magic]] to facilitate their work.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Coriolis Rillevay]], a [[gnome]] [[sorcerer]] and clockwork artist, began her [[adventurer|adventuring]] career during the late 15{{th}} century DR with a ''wand of tinkering'', which she favored for casting the ''[[witch bolt]]'' spell.
